raw_body:
PATHIRANA – DHARMADASA GAMARACHCHI (Retired Deputy Auditor General). Beloved husband of Sujatha Pathirana,​ loving father of Hemantha,​ Vasantha,​ beloved father-in-law of Nissanka,​ Sahan,​ grandfather of Chanumi. Remains will lie for viewing at Jayarathne Restpect Home from 8.30 a.m. till 5.00 p.m. on Thursday 21st March. Cremation at Borella Cemetery at 5.30 p.m. on Thursday,​ 21st March.
019854
